text: {{Infobox person | name = Emily Reid | image = | birth_name = | birth_date = | birth_place = London, England | occupation = Actress | years_active = 2019–present | alma mater = The Juilliard School Emily Reid is an English actress, known for her roles as Sophia Trenchard on the ITV drama series Belgravia (2020) and Roxanna Dubiki on the ITV comedy-drama series The Trouble with Maggie Cole (2020). ==Education and training== In 2020, Reid was awarded a scholarship to train at the Juilliard School. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
